name: Hardcore Platformer
description:
!!! WARNING !!!

The game is still in the beta state so expect some bugs.

I am still working to fix them so please be pacient.

Cute little knight tries to get over some pretty hard levels. If that doesn't sell you, I don't know what will. Just look at him, he's so cute.

Also this is my first game so please leave a feedback in the comment section below. :d
